body:
Hey, So, I have been doing and Editing Texture packs for a lot of Time, But Never thought of Sharing with all of you guys! So Since I probably will Be leaving Minecraft, I will have a Lot of time free, So I will be making them

Requirements:
- Having 150 Subs on Youtube or 150 followers on Twitter.

Exceptions:
- Staff members. I will Make a Texture Pack to Every Staff member That Says so.
- Members with Referee And Media Rank.
- Members that I get on well with(i.e Awesomerp, Snow, Vlad)

Tags:
If accepted, I will Reply to your post saying You´ve been Accepted with a [Accepted] Tag
If denied, I will Reply to your post saying You´ve been Denied with a [Denied] Tag

Method of Application:
Channel or Twitter Name:
IGN:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
And For those of you that Do not meet the requirements, Do not worry! Because If you give me a, ``Good Reason´´to make you one, I will make you one.

REMINDER:
This takes a while, So do not expect the pack to be finished 5 minutes after you have asked for it, Be patient.
Once I choose if you are [Accepted] or [Denied], You´ll have to add me on my Business skype: lerptfx

Good luck!

Good luck!

replies.body: Custom texture packs are good to have because if you have a youtube channel, you can release your private pack for like a 150 subscribers video. Also, if you mention that you will release your private pack at 150 subs or whatever, it will encourage people to subscribe.
